original_text: Peter continued to talk to Cornelius and they went into the house. Peter saw that many people had come together there in the house.
korean_text: 더불어 말하며 들어가 여러 사람이 모인 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: Peter continued to talk to Cornelius
and they went into the house
Peter saw that many people had come together
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 많은 사람들이 모여 있는 것을 보았습니다
